org.chrisjr.loom

Class Loom

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chrisjr.loom.Loom

  • public class Loom
extends Object
    A Loom holds all of the Patterns associated with the user's sketch, and provides facilities to play or record the output of patterns at the desired rate. By default, it uses a RealTimeScheduler with a period of 1000 milliseconds.
